{}.response: The Web Search API allows you to incorporate Bing's search capabilities into your application. It enables you to query the Bing search engine programmatically, letting you retrieve web data, along with suggested keywords for your search terms. This API taps into Bing's extensive search index, delivering relevant search results including web pages, images, local business info, and news directly to your users. It's ideal for creating customized search experiences in your services or applications, providing users with ad-free, secure, and rich search results pulled from the vast resources of Microsoft Azure's data.
